title: Central bank buys bonds, MS increases

content.question: Assume a countryâ€™s banking system has limited reserves. Which of the following policy actions will directly increase the money supply?

choices.label: The central bank purchases government bonds on the open market.
The central bank sells government bonds on the open market.
The government increases taxes without changing its spending.
The government decreases taxes without changing its spending.
The government decreases taxes while simultaneously decreasing its spending.

content.answer: The central bank purchases government bonds on the open market.
